name: Alure

skills.name: Triple Strike (A1)
skills.description: Attacks 3 times at random. Decreases the target's Turn Meter by 25% on each critical hit.

effects.notes: Triple hit. Each crit hit decreases TM by 25%.

skills.book_value: Useful but A2/A3 book priority varies by use-case
skills.notes: Works best with Crit-focused builds to maximise TM reduction.

skills.name: Defiling Gust (A2)
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 30% Decrease DEF debuff for 1 turn. Places Sleep on targets under Decrease DEF.

effects.notes: Double AoE hit. Each hit can place Decrease DEF and Sleep (conditional).

skills.book_value: High: reduces cooldown and boosts proc chance; useful in group content.
skills.notes: Good AoE clear and DEF shred support for teams relying on DEF-sensitive nukers.

skills.name: Piercing Malediction (A3)
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has an extra 30% chance of inflicting a critical hit and will ignore 50% of the target's DEF.

effects.notes: Single-target nuke. 50% ignore DEF. Extra 30% crit chance.

skills.book_value: High: booking improves cooldown and reliability for clutch kills.
skills.notes: Primary nuke; pairs well with accuracy/crit and ignore-def comps.

general: - GIANT SLAYER: A1 is 3-hit random attack → 3 chances for 30% proc per hit = superior for PVE bosses (Fire Knight TM lock specialist)
- Helmsmasher: Arena nuke builds → stacks additively with A3 ignore 50% DEF (total 75% DEF ignore)
- Evil Eye: A1 TM control synergy (-20% TM on first hit with A1) → stacks with A1 inherent TM reduction (25% per crit)
- Kill Streak: +6% damage per kill (max +12%) → snowball damage in waves
- Eagle Eye + Pinpoint Accuracy: A2 Decrease DEF requires ACC (30% chance per hit)
- 100% C.RATE CRITICAL: A1 TM reduction only triggers on crits (25% TM per crit hit) → Fire Knight specialist
FIRE KNIGHT BUILD: Giant Slayer + Evil Eye + 100% C.RATE for TM lock
ARENA PRIORITY: Helmsmasher for DEF ignore stacking (75% total with A3)

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Alure is THE champion for Fire Knight TM lock cheese. A1 3-hit random attack with 25% TM reduction per crit hit → with 100% C.RATE, can reduce Fire Knight TM by 75% per turn (3 hits × 25%). Combined with Evil Eye mastery (-20% TM on first hit), can TM lock Fire Knight indefinitely. Build for 100% C.RATE, high SPD, and Giant Slayer for multi-hit proc synergy.

mechanics_advisory: Alure is a legendary Fire Knight TM lock specialist. A1 3-hit random attack with 25% TM reduction per crit → 100% C.RATE is CRITICAL for TM control. Giant Slayer synergizes with A1 3-hit for boss damage. A3 ignores 50% DEF (stacks with Helmsmasher for 75% total in Arena). A2 AoE Decrease DEF + conditional Sleep. Best used for Fire Knight (TM lock cheese), dungeon wave clear, and Arena nuking. Build for 100% C.RATE (mandatory for TM control), C.DMG, ATK%, SPD, and ACC (A2 Decrease DEF).
